title: (x) A selection Of Work - Lucida Bright {Eduardo}
content:
Hi folks   
   
This one's making me feel like a right-type philistine, originally I though it was Times, then Plantin... seems to be neither.   
   
Any idea's?? ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080612190121im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/41657.gif)   
   
A

comments.content: Good call Eduardo. I couldn't see the serifs well enough in the sample, but the e-shape sure fits.
